text: Edward Sanford may refer to: * Edward Sanford (New York politician) (1805–1876), American lawyer, writer and politician from New York * Edward Ayshford Sanford (1794–1871), British Member of Parliament * Edward J. Sanford (1831–1902), American manufacturing tycoon and financier * Edward Terry Sanford (1865–1930), American jurist
title: Edward Sanford
